locations.name: Ancient Library
locations.guide: üßô‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è A wise librarian beckons you to explore ancient knowledge.
locations.prompt: You discover a complex puzzle in an old manuscript. How do you approach solving it?

options.label: Analyze the patterns and create a systematic approach
Sketch out visual diagrams to understand the structure
Ask others for help and collaborate on the solution
Follow the established rules and procedures step by step

locations.name: Innovation Workshop
locations.guide: üîß An inventor invites you to create something amazing.
locations.prompt: You're given materials to build something innovative. What do you create?

options.label: Design a practical tool that solves a real problem
Create an artistic installation that expresses emotions
Build a system that helps others work more efficiently
Develop a prototype for a new business idea

locations.name: Community Garden
locations.guide: üå± A gardener shows you how to nurture growth.
locations.prompt: You notice the garden needs better organization. How do you help improve it?

options.label: Create a detailed plan and coordinate everyone's efforts
Design beautiful layouts and inspire others with your vision
Research best practices and implement scientific methods
Teach others new techniques and share your knowledge

locations.name: Digital Marketplace
locations.guide: üíª A tech entrepreneur offers you a chance to create something digital.
locations.prompt: You have an opportunity to create a digital product. What do you focus on?

options.label: Develop a useful app that solves everyday problems
Create engaging content that entertains and educates
Build a platform that connects people and communities
Design a system that manages data and processes efficiently

locations.name: Grand Stage
locations.guide: üé≠ A performer invites you to share your talents.
locations.prompt: You're invited to perform or present something. What do you choose to do?

options.label: Deliver a compelling speech that inspires action
Create an artistic performance that moves emotions
Present research findings that solve real problems
Organize a collaborative performance with others

locations.name: Research Laboratory
locations.guide: üß™ A scientist offers you a chance to conduct important research.
locations.prompt: You're conducting an important experiment. How do you approach the research?

options.label: Follow strict protocols and document everything systematically
Explore creative hypotheses and innovative methods
Collaborate with a team to share knowledge and resources
Focus on practical applications that help people

locations.name: Leadership Summit
locations.guide: üèîÔ∏è A wise leader asks you to take charge of an important initiative.
locations.prompt: You're asked to lead an important initiative. How do you approach leadership?

options.label: Analyze the situation and create a strategic plan
Inspire others with a compelling vision and creative ideas
Build strong relationships and empower team members
Focus on practical execution and measurable results
